version_description:
v2.9.0 Changelog

* Added "New UI Mode".
- Now you can experience new UI of Capriccio.

* Following issues are resolved.
- Improved some view transition issues on iOS 7.
- Fixed an issue that playback position slider was slightly shifted on iOS 7.0.3.
- Fixed an issue that the app unexpectedly crashed when trying to edit description of sound effect prior to iOS 7.

v2.0.5 Changelog

- Added download feature for network files (Dropbox, ucloud, FTP connection).
- Added sidemenu size setting.

- Improved about connection handling for FTP connection.
- Improved stability of Dropbox connection.
- Improved stability of ucloud connection.
- Improved stability of FTP connection.
- Improved to use SSL connection for ucloud.
- Improved to download in a row on URL downloads.
- Improved about updating iPod Library items.
- Improved stability for playback control.

- Fixed an issue that the app rarely crashes when trying to use FTP connection.
- Fixed an issue that the app sometimes play music when doing phone call.
- Fixed an issue that the navigation bar of URL downloads view did not show at the beginning of the launch.
- Fixed an issue that not started items of URL downloads are shown abnormally.
- Fixed other known issues.

* Followings are applied to New UI Mode.
- Improvement of overall UI performance
- iOS-specific gestures
- Tab browsing of media explorer
- Media management features of media exploer
- Playlist management features
- CUE file support
- Some other settings

* Following issues are resolved.
- Improved on UI selection view to show in localized language.
- Fixed lyrics issue that they are not shown correctly on device which "Bold Text" setting is enabled.
- Fixed WiFi server issue that HTTP server is not initialized properly.
- Fixed a crash issue when trying to play specific AIFF files.
- Fixed several other issues.

v2.9.2 Changelog

* Followings are applied to New UI Mode.
- Redesign of User Interface
- Improvement of overall UI performance
- Notice features
- Some other settings

* Following issues are resolved.
- Added support for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus.
- Improved initial loading interface.
- Fixed a crash issue on iOS 7.
- Fixed several other issues.

Capriccio is upgraded to 3.0.0. Several features of previous version are not included in this upgrade. Please refer to http://irb.so/cp3upgrade for more information.

- New interface and re-implemented app structure
- Integrated media library which supports both iPod library and music files in Capriccio file system
- Support FTP, WebDAV, Dropbox, and Google Drive

â€» If you have experienced connectivity issues in FTP or WebDAV, please retry from the first page of Media Explorer menu after installing this update.

v 3.0.1:
- Applied several security patches related to network connection
- Fixed a connectivity issue on FTP which does not use UTF-8 encoding
- Fixed an issue that lists of several folders in WebDAV cannot be retrieved
- Fixed an issue that songs in several WebDAV connections cannot be played
- Fixed several other identified issues

v 3.0.2
- Fixed misbehaviors on parsing specific ID3v2 tags
- Fixed issues related to applying replay gain information
- Fixed issues related to listing Podcast items
- Fixed a crash bug on touching status bar
- Added Japanese support
- Fixed several other identified issues

v 3.0.3
- Improved the "randomly play" algorithm
- Applied several fixes related to unexpected crashes
- Fixed several issues related to play songs in iPod library
- Fixed several issues related to play songs in network storages
- Fixed several other identified issues

v 3.0.4:
- Fixed an issue related to editing order of items in playlists
- Improved compatibility of listing directories in FTP
- Fixed several other identified issues

v 3.0.5:
- Improved overall structure of internal databases and fixed several related issues
- Fixed a crash issue on seeking end of the position
- Fixed several other identified issues

Major changes:
- Recovered sound effect sharing features
- Recovered downloading songs in network sources
- Added network file caching features
- Improved some parts of the interface
- Improved the overall performance and fixed several identified issues

Details:
* Capriccio Account
- A Capriccio Account is required to share sound effects. Therefore, features related to Capriccio Account such as signing in and creating account are added.

* Features about sound effects
- Sound effect sharing features are recovered.
- Added support for searching shared effects.
- Added the migration of effects shared via previous versions of Capriccio.
- The structure of effects is reverted to previous style.

* Features about media explorer
- Downloading songs in network sources is recovered.
- Added support for Box as a cloud storage.
- Fixed an issue that some lists of FTP directories were not properly retrieved.
- Fixed issues related to search features on iPod playlists and URL streaming list.

* Features related to playback
- Added network file caching.
- Fixed an issue that "Use Audio Buffer" setting was not applied properly.
- Improved algorithms of the random playback.

* Improvements of the interface
- Added support for the swipe gesture on the left side for the navigation.
- Partially improved the interface of the left side menu.
- Improved the interface of command windows.

* Others
- Recovered the setting related to showing album art on the lock screen.
- Added links to Terms and Privacy Policy.
- Enhanced the internal security on manipulating app settings and network source information.
- Fixed several other identified issues.

v 3.1.1:
- Fixed crash issues on retrieving information of songs in iPod library
- Fixed an issue that pre/post gain settings were not properly applied right after the adjustment
- Added support for OneDrive
- Added Spanish translation
- Fixed several other identified issues

v 3.1.2:
- Improved compatibility with iOS 10
- Updated APIs for Dropbox and Google Drive
- Fixed an issue that the app was occasionally crashed on rotating the device
- Improved several user interface features
- Fixed several other identified issues

* Interface improvements
- Added "Quick Panel" on "Now Playing" menu
- Improved several VoiceOver-related accessibility features
- Improved usability of the equalizer editor
- Fixed an issue that selection menu on text fields was not be shown

* Playback features
- Added settings for random playback types
- Added support for seeking features from earphone controllers
- Improved audio buffer settings to be applied instantly
- Improved performance on changing multiple songs in short time
- Fixed several issues related to network file caching

* Media explorer features
- Added downloading network files on background
- Improved performance of downloading network files
- Improved media library updates to pause updating when the app goes inactive

* Others
- Removed feature about migrating previous versions (v2.x) of sound effects
- Added Chinese (Simplified, Traditional) and Turkish translations
- Fixed several other identified issues

v 3.2.1:
- Improved support for FLAC, OPUS, and WV formats
- Improved support for landscape mode
- Improved several interface related features
- Fixed several other identified issues

v 3.2.2:
- Added "show hidden files" option
- Fixed issues related to library features of songs in Capriccio File System
- Fixed crash issues related to large album art images
- Fixed issues related to CUE files
- Fixed several other identified issues

v 3.2.3:
- Fixed issues related to several filenames on iOS 10.3
- Improved Wi-Fi FTP transfer features

v 3.2.4:
- Fixed issues related to several filenames on iOS 10.3

v 3.2.5:
- Fixed more issues related to several filenames on iOS 10.3
- Fixed issues that corrupted text was occasionally shown on several devices

v 3.2.6:
- Fixed issues related to the authentication of Google Drive
- Fixed search-related issues in Media Explorer
* It is necessary to re-authenticate Google Drive, due to changes in the authentication process.

* Added support for Send Anywhere
Capriccio now supports convenient file transfer features powered by "Send Anywhere".
- It supports not only file transfer between Capriccio apps, but also between Capriccio and Mac or PC by accessing the Send Anywhere website on web browser.
- Send files: Select files to transfer on Folder browser and select [Send...] - [Send Anywhere].
- Receive files: Select [Receive] button on Folder browser and enter the key generated from the other device.

* Interface improvements
- Improved functions and edit mode of "Media explorer" and "Now playing list" views
- Improved left and right side menus to be wider on several devices
- Added "clear" button on text fields

* Features improvements
- Improved media library features to consider disc number for sorting songs having same album title
- Fixed issues related to upgrade internal media library database
- Fixed an issue that an empty error message was shown when an error occurred while trying to play song in network storages

* Others
- Fixed several other identified issues

v 3.3.1:
- Improved compatibility with iOS 11
- Added support for changing playback position on the lock screen and Control Center (iOS 9.1+)
- Improved processing large album arts
- Fixed crash issues related to updating songs in iPod Library
- Fixed crash issues related to scrolling long lists
- Fixed an issue that "add" features were missing for playlists in the Explorer menu
- Fixed issues that some FTP clients could not connect to Wi-Fi Server (FTP).
- Fixed an issue that network file cache features did not working correctly.
- Fixed other known issues and improved several UI features

- Added support for the Files app on iOS 11 or higher
- Fixed a crash issue when some specific Accessibility features are enabled
- Fixed several other identified issues

v 3.3.2:
- Improved compatibility with iPhone X
- Fixed several known issues

* Enhanced player UI
- You can experience more sophisticated player interface.

* Features improvements
- Improved file transfer features based on Send Anywhere.
- Improved performance of speed control.

* Others
- Improved several security-related features.
- Fixed several other identified issues.

- Added support for the Files app on iOS 11 or higher
- Fixed a crash issue when some specific Accessibility features are enabled
- Fixed several other identified issues

- Applied updates of the changed operator
- Removed support for Send Anywhere
- Improved compatibility with recent iPhone and iPad devices
- Added support for WebM format files
- Improved performance of speed/pitch controls
- Applied several tweaks for future 4.0 updates
- Fixed several other identified issues
- Fixed FTP connection issues appeared in v3.4.5

- Improved playback preparation scheme for network storage files
- Fixed the renaming issue for files in Capriccio File System
- Fixed several other issues

- Changed where the bottom ads are displayed
- Improved downloading order for network storage files
- Fixed several other issues

- Fixed crash issues on loading specific MP3 files
- Fixed several other issues

* Overall interface improvements
- The overall interface of the app is improved.
- Supports dark mode.
- Supports easier navigation through the libraries, folders, and playlists in the Explorer screen.
- Settings that were applied after restarting the app are now applied without restarting.

* Feature improvements
- The overall performance of the app is improved.
- Double tap / click gesture is added.
- Added function to adjust the size of lyrics in the player.
- Various other functions are improved.

Data migration will be performed on the first run after updating from the previous version. Please do not close the app while it is in progress.

- Show Wi-Fi File Transfer button within Capriccio File Storage
- Fixed an issue where some network music files could not be played depending on the network file cache settings
- Fixed some other issues

- Fixed an issue in connecting to WebDAV servers using specific authentication methods
- Fixed an issue in connecting to FTP servers using specific transmission methods

- Improved player design
- Added player background setting
- Fixed an issue where song history was not properly preserved during random playback
- Fixed an issue where the swipe back gesture did not work on some screens
- Improved Turkish translation
- Fixed several other issues

- Adjusted default color of the player background
- Restored the feature of showing album arts of library items in the Capriccio playlists
- Fixed touch effect issue in grid view
- Improved compatibility with some FTP servers
- Applied several interface improvements and bug fixes

- Improved compatibility with audio tags in some music files
- Improved compatibility with some FTP servers
- Improved to show album arts in the internal library playlists
- Fixed an issue on the A-B repeat function at the end of the audio content
- Fixed several other issues

- Fixed a possible crash issue when playing songs having short duration
- Adjusted internal logic of the A-B repeat feature
- Fixed several other issues

- Added sorting features in descending order
- Improved to preserve speed/pitch control settings after restarting the app
- Fixed an issue on sorting by file size
- Fixed an occasional issue related to opening from other apps
- Fixed an issue on searching media with non-English characters
- Fixed several other issues
